title: Slice of Hell Cake
summaries: The Slice of Hell Cake is a pet-summoning item that can be found in Shadow Chests, Hellstone Crates, and Obsidian Crates. It summons a Baby Imp pet that follows the player around. When the player is far enough away, the Baby Imp will spread its arms and fly to catch up to the player.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a baby imp
'He hasn't learned how to teleport yet!'
